topic.title: 공항 보안 검색대 통과하기
topic.description: 공항 보안 검색대를 통과하는 과정에서 필요한 필수 영어 표현을 배워봅니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 보안요원: 가방에서 노트북을 꺼내서 바구니에 넣어주세요.
보안요원: 네, 신발과 벨트도 벗어서 바구니에 담아주세요.
보안요원: 네, 금속 탐지기를 통과해 주세요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Officer: Hello. May I see your boarding pass?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Officer: Hello. | May I see your boarding pass?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Officer: Please take your laptop out of the bag and put it in a bin.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Officer: Please take your laptop out of the bag | and put it in a bin.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Passenger: Do I need to take off my shoes?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Passenger: Do I need to | take off my shoes?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Officer: Yes, please take off your shoes and belt and put them in a bin as well.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Officer: Yes, | please take off your shoes and belt | and put them in a bin as well.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Passenger: Okay. Can I go through now?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Passenger: Okay. | Can I go through now?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Officer: Yes, please walk through the metal detector.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Officer: Yes, | please walk through | the metal detector.

Okay. Can I go through now?
Yes, please walk through the metal detector.

learning_points.foreign_phrase: May I see your boarding pass?

highlight_sentences.foreign_text: Please take your laptop out of the bag and put it in a bin.
highlight_sentences.reason: 공항 보안 검색대에서 가장 흔하게 듣는 지시사항 중 하나로, 전자 기기를 어떻게 처리해야 하는지 알려주는 핵심적인 문장입니다.
